body_html:
@hemangjoshi37a

Guys, thanks to @lchen23, I found the root cause of this issue. It's about intel-openmp. If you installed the conda-forge version, then this issue will emerge. The way to fix it is very simple: conda install -c defaults intel-openmp -f.

Have you tried this?

There is nothing written in #7979

Sure. It is a PR, not a issue. The changes are written in the code, not in the conversions.

Please help me.

Don't express like this, please. It doesn't help here. You will just have to make the issue clear.
